name: Swings and Spikeabouts
description:
Grapple about a procedurally generated space. Grapple, slide, wish you had this sweet buttery-smooth movement in other games, and suffer Dan's first jab at writing any kind of music.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to Jump

Left click to grapple

Right click to release grapple

Left-Shift to start new paths

R to Reset the level

Shift to use Lens (point at the generating end of a path when you do this, see what happens)

M to mute and save your ears
